title: Define Project Requirements and Scope - Refined
description: This RFC outlines the refined requirements and scope for the PetBehaviorAnalyzer project. The purpose of the project is to develop a machine learning system that analyzes pet behavior patterns to identify and address potential issues, with the goal of improving pet health and wellbeing by predicting and addressing behavioral issues. Key stakeholders include pet owners, veterinarians, and pet care providers. Their requirements include accurate analysis, user-friendly interface, privacy protection, compliance with relevant data protection laws, and responsiveness to different pet species. Potential constraints are data availability, computational resources, integration with existing pet health platforms, and ensuring the system is secure and scalable. Specific machine learning models or techniques that will be employed include anomaly detection, time-series forecasting, reinforcement learning, clustering algorithms, and transfer learning to accommodate different species. To address computational resources, consider using cloud services for scaling. Also, a clear roadmap and timeline should be provided for the development process, considering potential milestones for each phase of development and testing. Once approved, this RFC will be assigned to the task-decomposer for further decomposition. Additionally, it would be beneficial to have a technical writer involved early in the process to ensure clear and concise documentation.

title: Develop Pet Behavior Data Collection Strategy
description: Research and design a method for collecting pet behavior data, including the use of sensors, video recording, or user input. Consider data privacy and security.

title: Design Machine Learning Models for Behavior Analysis
description: Research and select appropriate machine learning models to analyze pet behavior patterns. Develop a plan for training, testing, and validating the models.
dependencies: Develop Pet Behavior Data Collection Strategy

title: Create Frontend Interface for User Input and Analysis Results
description: Design and develop a user-friendly frontend interface that allows users to input pet behavior data and view analysis results.
dependencies: Develop Pet Behavior Data Collection Strategy

title: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing and Analysis
description: Design and implement backend services for data processing, analysis using the selected machine learning models, and secure storage of pet behavior data.
dependencies: Develop Pet Behavior Data Collection Strategy
Design Machine Learning Models for Behavior Analysis

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend Services
description: Connect the frontend interface to the backend services, ensuring smooth data flow and efficient communication.
dependencies: Create Frontend Interface for User Input and Analysis Results

title: Develop Unit Tests for Each Functionality
description: Write unit tests to ensure each functionality of the system works as intended.
